summary: Here\'s two retextured armors that I created that replace shrouded armor.
descriptionHtml:
I don\'t know how to make standalone items, but heres two different uniforms to wear regardless, batteries and exessories sold seperatley. This is a shrouded armor replacer, only the top and pants have been modded.

Instalation: place \" dbarmor_male_torso \" into SKYRIM/data/ textures/ armor/ dbarmor. 
For the grey version remove the blue version and rename the grey version \" dbarmor_male_torso \".

Mods used in screenshots are:
- Appachi Hair
- Better Body Scale For Khajiits and Argonians - the Light Body file -...Its a great mod would live to see him add a Light Body file with longer legs.
- Race Morpher
- Handsome Male Elves and Humans.
- Fantabulous FXAA Tool
- Vuals Flora Overhall
author: nikc1991
